 1999-21091999-11-300,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisAppointment of GERALD A. CLARKE, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
